TunableList.name: INGREDIENT_QUALITY_MAPPING
TunableList.description: Mapping of all possible ingredient quality states to what possible states will the ingredients have. e.g. High quality ingredients need to be mapped to gardening high quality, fish high quality or any state that will indicate what high quality means on a different system.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The states that will define the ingredient quality.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: Definition of the ingredient quality state. This will define the quality boost on the recipe and the possible states an ingredient can have to have this state.

Tunable.name: quality_boost
Tunable.description: Value that will be added to the quality commodity whenever this state is added.

TunableList.name: state_value_list
TunableList.description: List of ingredient states that will give this level of ingredient quality.

Tunable.description: The states that will define the ingredient quality.

TunableEnum.name: INGREDIENT_TAG
TunableEnum.description: Tag to look for when iterating through objects to know if they are ingredients. All ingredients should be tuned with this tag.

TunableList.name: INGREDIENT_TAG_DISPLAY_MAPPING
TunableList.description: Mapping of all object tags to their localized string that will display on the ingredient list. This will be used for displaying on the recipe's when an ingredient is tuned by tag instead of object definition. Example: Display objects of rag FISH as string "Any Fish"

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: Tag corresponding at an ingredient type that can be used in a recipe.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: A localized string that may use tokens.

Tunable.name: OPTIONAL_INGREDIENT_LIST_STRING
Tunable.description: The string for having an optional list of ingredients. This will be shown on tooltips of pie menu recipe interactions. Example: "Optional: {0.String}" Tokens: 0 - String containing a list of ingredients.

Tunable.name: RECIPE_COMPLETE_INGREDIENT_STRING
Tunable.description: The string for having all of one ingredient type needed for a recipe. This will be shown on tooltips of pie menu recipe interactions. Example: "{0.String}" Tokens: 0 - String containing an ingredient and how many you own/need.

Tunable.name: RECIPE_INCOMPLETE_INGREDIENT_STRING
Tunable.description: The string for not having all of one ingredient type needed for a recipe. This will be shown on tooltips of pie menu recipe interactions. Example: "{0.String}" Tokens: 0 - String containing an ingredient and how many you own/need.

Tunable.name: REQUIRED_INGREDIENT_LIST_STRING
Tunable.description: The string for requiring a list of ingredients. This will be shown on tooltips of pie menu recipe interactions. Example: "Required: {0.String}" Tokens: 0 - String containing a list of ingredients.

Tunable.name: SINGLE_INGREDIENT_TYPE_STRING
Tunable.description: The string that contains an ingredient and how much of it the sim has access to. This will be shown in tooltips for pie menu recipe interactions. Example: "{0.String} - ({1.Number}/{2.Number})" Tokens: 0 - ingredient string 1 - number owned 2 - number needed
